entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
